content: …I write out in a clockwise spiral and end up using all the available space; text islands of thoughts and ideas…I call that my rubbish draft…days later, I try to figure out what I was attempting to say, and then bang it into a shape and order that might actually be meaningful. I’ve written four plays this way, and all of my blog posts. I guess its a kind of mind-mapping, but my version of it :) If I write a sentence at the top of a lined page, that’s as far as it goes…it doesn’t tickle the mind to go any further; the dreaded writers block! Hope that helps…it certainly helps me :)
